add.title: Add account
add.description: Generate next account from secret phrase.

connect.title: Connect ledger.
connect.description: Generate hardware account from ledger device.

ledger.title: Ledger connect
ledger.placeholder: Select an index your ledger address.
ledger.info: ledger is separated your addresses by index, for restore your account you can select any index from 0 to 256

question.0: Would you like to connect to

connect.warn: After confirmation, this application will be able to request data from the blockchain and see your accounts.

tokens.no_tokens_serach: No tokens with name or symbol:

start.title: Let’s get started
start.subt_title: Create or restore your Zilliqa wallet.

create.title: Secret phrase
print: DO NOT FORGET to save your mnemonic Seed Phrase. You will need your
Mnemonic Seed Phrase to restore your wallet.
Do not lose it! It cannot be recovered if you lose it.
Do not share it! Your funds will be stolen if you use this file on a phishing site.
Make a backup! Secure it like the millions of dollars it may one day be worth.

verify.title: Words verify
verify.placeholder: Pick words here in order and recreate your secret phrase.

restore.title: Restore.
restore.placeholder: Input secret phrase, with a space between words.

setup_acc.title: Account setup
setup_acc.name_description: A wallet name is using to help you distinguish different account from one another.
setup_acc.pass_description: A password required for encrypt and protect your keys.

wallet_created.title: Wallet is generated!
wallet_created.subt_title: Your account has been created - Keep your secret phase safe, it’s your responsibility!

tips.title: Tips on storing it safely

list.0: Save a backup in multiple places
list.1: Never share the phrase with anyone
list.2: Be careful of phising! ZilPay will never spontaneously ask for your secret phrase
list.3: If you need to back up your secret phrase again, you can find it in Security
list.4: If you ever have a question or see something fishy, contact us.

tips.warn: ZilPay team cannot recover your secret phrase!

selected.title: Selected netwrok
selected.description: You can change the network to testnet or private.

node.title: Change network config
node.description: You can change the node url and msg number, for use yourself private node.

ssn.title: Zilliqa nodes
ssn.description: You can change the node url and msg number, for use yourself private node.

p_modal.title: Secret Recovery Phrase
p_modal.warn: DO NOT share this phrase with anyone! These words can be used to steal all your accounts.

phrase.title: Reveal Secret Recovery Phrase
phrase.description: If you ever change browsers or move computers, you will need this Secret Recovery Phrase to access your accounts. Save them somewhere safe and secret.
phrase.label: Enter password to continue

key.title: Show Private Keys
key.warn: Warning: Never disclose this key. Anyone with your private keys can steal any assets held in your account.

phishing.title: Use Phishing Detection
phishing.warn: Display a warning for phishing domains targeting Zilliqa users

contacts.title: Contacts
contacts.description: Add, edit, remove, and manage your contacts.

advanced.title: Advanced
advanced.description: Gas controller, address format, popup settings.

networks.title: Networks
networks.description: Add and edit custom RPC networks.

connections.title: Connections
connections.description: Dapps list, manage your connections, add, remove.

security.title: Security & Privacy
security.description: Privacy settings and wallet Secret Recovery Phrase.

about.title: About
about.description: Version, support center, and contact info.

currency.title: Currency Conversion
currency.description: You can switch to another currency to track your balance in it.

theme.title: Interface theme.
theme.description: ZIlPay can change colors between light and dark mode

gas.title: Gas controls.
gas.description: Choose your default gas price, all your transactions will use these gas parameters.

base16.title: Base16 address format.
base16.description: you can change the address format to base16, be careful and do not send other currencies to this address!

popup.title: Popup
popup.description: You can disable the appearance of the transaction confirmation window.
